Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Methods
  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    waffle.jaas.GroupPrincipal
    This class is deprecated as hiding a principal inside another principal is not JAAS compliant. Use the Principals in the Subject to directly enroll groups or roles by name.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    waffle.apache.WindowsRealm.getName()
    This will be removed in Tomcat 9 onwards. Use Class.getSimpleName() instead.
    waffle.mock.http.SimpleHttpSession.getSessionContext()
    Remove this once servlet does.
    waffle.mock.http.SimpleHttpSession.getValue(String)
    Remove this once servlet does.
    waffle.mock.http.SimpleHttpSession.getValueNames()
    Remove this once servlet does.
    waffle.mock.http.SimpleHttpSession.putValue(String, Object)
    Remove this once servlet does.
    waffle.mock.http.SimpleHttpSession.removeValue(String)
    Remove this once servlet does.
